mainEntity.name: What is the White Screen tool used for?

acceptedAnswer.text: It displays a pure white background, commonly used for lighting, brightness tests, or cleaning stuck pixels.

mainEntity.name: Can it be used as a light source?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Many users use the white screen to brighten dark rooms or as a makeshift soft light for photography or Zoom meetings.

mainEntity.name: Will it harm my eyes or monitor?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, but avoid staring at bright white light for long periods. It's safe for monitors.
Yes. Use your device's brightness control to reduce or increase light intensity.
